display_long_description:
**Spatial Web Shooter** is all about web shooting — with tons of unique experiences to bring your superpower dream to life like never before.
# Free Play
In Free Play, you can freely shoot webs across your space.
[media]
Watching them wrap around your environment is deeply satisfying — but that's just the beginning.

Place **fun, interactive props** like doors, chairs, or a skateboard, and use your webs to move, swing, or smash them around. It feels so real, you’ll start believing in your powers.
[media]

Then come the **Reality Enhancement Props** — a whole new layer of immersion.
- Put the **Mirror prop** on your real mirror and **see yourself reflected with real-time web effects**. For the first time ever, you can actually see yourself as the web-powered hero.
[media]
- Place a virtual zone on your kitchen range hood so it absorbs webs.
[media]

And how about bringing a **dinosaur** to life right in your space with this **Super Prop**?
[media]

# Challenge Modes
You’ll start with 3 props unlocked. To get more, take on thrilling challenge modes like **Dinosaur Fight**, **Treasure Catch** or **Web Escape**.
Earn **Web Points** and redeem them for **Mystery Boxes** — each one unlocks a surprise prop to use in your space.
[media]
[media]
**More props and Challenges are in development!**

Whether you're experimenting, practicing your skills or showing off to friends, Spatial Web Shooter transforms your real world into a dynamic, web-powered playground.
